654590.name: Fantasy Grounds - Ddraig Goch's Tyranny Pack 8 (Token Pack)
654590.description:
Ddraig Goch's Tyranny Pack 8

This product depicts 61 uniquely designed, 3D rendered tokens to be used in your fantasy role-playing games. The pack consists of both good and evil forces. Adult White Dragon, Air Elemental, Bar Keep, Cloud Giant Leader, Dragonborn leader both dead and alive, Dragonclaws both male and female, Dragonwings both male and female, Griffon, Guards both male and female, Guard Drakes, Gargoyles both whole and smashed, Kobolds, Ogres, Red Wizards, Rug of Smothering, Stone Giants, Vampire Countess in normal form, wolf, bat and mist form, Wyverns both alive and dead. Plus as a bonus I have added Ballistas, 2 wagons full of goods, Dragonborn Leader from Pack 2 and the Red Wizard from Pack 6.
This Token Pack includes:
  • Air Elemental
  • 3 Ballistas
  • Bar Keep
  • 3 Cloud Giants
  • Cultist Captain
  • 2 Dragonborns
  • 5 Dragonclaws
  • Dragonwing
  • 3 Gargoyles
  • Griffon
  • 2 Guard Drakes
  • Guard Dwarf Female
  • 3 Guards Male
  • Guard Orc Female
  • Guard Tiefling Female
  • 3 Kobolds
  • 5 Ogres
  • 3 Red Wizards
  • 2 Rugs of Smothering
  • 2 Stone Giants
  • 3 Stone Golems
  • 3 Vampire Countesses (various forms)
  • Vampire Mist
  • 2 Vampire Spawn
  • 2 Wagons
  • 3 White Dragons
  • 3 Wyverns
Conversion by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
